content: klose knit s baby booties yarn 150 fingering weight yarn dk or sport weight yarn size newborn 3 month needles 1 set of double pointed needles size us 2 abbreviations k2tog knit 2 together ssk slip two sts knit-wise slip both sts onto left hand needle then knit both together yo yarn over instructions cast on 8 10 stitches knit 32 40 row this is the sole of the bootie set up row for side of bootie the needle that now holds the 8 10 live stitches is needle # 1 with needle #2 knit up 16 19 stitches one per row along the side of the sole with needle # 3 knit up 8 10 stitches along cast on edge with needle# 4 knit up 16 19 place to pin to mark beginning stitches along the other side of the sole place pin to mark the beginning of the row 48 58 complete side of bootie maintaining needles 1 -4 in their positions as set up above use fifth needle in garter stitch for 16 20 row closing the toe work back and forth on needle no 1 a as follows row 1 k 7 9 k2tog a stitch from needle 1 and a stitch from needle 2 turn row 2 k 7 9 ssk a stitch from needle 1 and a stitch from needle 4 turn repeat row 1 + 2 until there are 8 stitches 10 stitches each on needles 2 + 4 32 40 stitches total 8 10 sts on each needle cuff resume working in the round knit for 2 row eyelet round *k2tog yo k2* repeat around row i cord tie cast on 2 stitches on needle #2 and knit until it is 14 weave i-cord around the ankle of the bootie so you can adjust the size done
